hero.tagline: Professional Code Deleter. What are we building next?

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm in love with creating useful and impactful products that brings people together. Experienced in multiple industries designing, simplifying, building and scaling solutions for startups and the enterprise. Using first-principle thinking.

My approach is simple: Iterate fast, iterate often, and dont stop iterating. And never say no, just dwell on it for a good moment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about my process and services.

questions.whatServicesOfferAnswer: I specialize in full-stack development and product management. This includes designing, simplifying, building and scaling solutions for startups using first-principle thinking. My expertise spans multiple industries, and I focus on creating useful and impactful products that make a real difference in people's lives.
questions.developmentProcess: What is your development process like?
questions.developmentProcessAnswer: My process is collaborative and iterative, typically involving a strong customer-developer feedback loop and focus on delivering value quickly. Communication is key, and there is no room for ego in the pursuit of excellence.
questions.workWithStartupsAnswer: Absolutely! I love working with startups to help shape their product vision and create solutions from the ground up. I've been involved in multiple zero-to-one startups and have experience taking ideas to MVP in as little as 1 week, and to product launch in as little as 2 weeks.
questions.programmingLanguages: What programming languages do you work with?
questions.programmingLanguagesAnswer: I work with Typescript, Python, Dart, Go, Java, and I'm currently learning Rust. I'm comfortable with both frontend and backend development.
questions.frameworksTechnologies: What frameworks and technologies do you use?
questions.frameworksTechnologiesAnswer:
For frontend: VueJS/Nuxt, React/Nextjs, Vite, Svelte
For backend: Nitro, Springboot, Directus, Laravel
For mobile: Flutter, Ionic
For DevOps: Nginx, Kubernetes, Pipeline/Actions, CircleCI, Serverless/CDK
For Cloud: AWS, Cloudflare, CodeMagic CI/CD, Actions, Cloudinary
questions.aiMlExperience: Do you have experience with AI/ML?
questions.aiMlExperienceAnswer: Yes, I work with CF Workers AI, Qdrant, and Vectorize. I also have experience with search technologies like Elasticsearch, Meilisearch, and Algolia.
questions.enjoyMostWork: What do you enjoy most about your work?
questions.enjoyMostWorkAnswer: I love creating useful and impactful products that make a real difference in people's lives. It's incredibly rewarding to see people interact with something I've built and find it genuinely useful. I enjoy the challenge of solving complex problems and the constant learning that comes with working in technology.
questions.whereBasedAnswer: I'm currently based in Tokyo, Japan. However, I work remotely with clients from around the world.

testimonials.quote1: Its difficult to find someone who is as dedicated as you are. You helped us out a lot.
testimonials.quote2: Thank you for helping us to grow. Even during the tough times.
testimonials.quote3: Relentless work. Gets the job done.

seo.defaultDescription: My primary focus is on creating useful and impactful products that make a real difference in people's lives. Over the course of my career, I gained extensive experience in designing, simplifying, coding and scaling various processes and solutions for startups, which has helped me develop a strong track record of success in achieving clients' goals and objectives.
